title: Client stalls / fails to connect on loading
body: I'm having a problem connecting to games after queue / champ select. The game will get to the connect / load screens with the champs and teams listed... and then my client stalls and disconnects. Any thoughts as to why this might be happening?

replies.body: When you're on the loading screen sometimes the slightest hiccup in your network can ruin all the loading progress. First up, double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is setup properly there. I would also pay extra attention to the parts on port forwarding and DNS settings, as something might be blocking your connection entirely.
